title: Sitka National Historical Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations              Kids Find Their Park   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:9 minutes, 13 seconds  Watch this fun video about how Sitka kids engage with their park!  Whether it's looking for crabs on the beach, teaching family members about totem poles, or picking up trash to make the park a better place, there's a lot for kids to do here.                 AUDIO DESCRIBED VERSION- Kids Find Their Park   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:9 minutes, 15 seconds  An audio-described version of our video about how Sitka kids engage with their park.                 Intertidal Zone Timelapse   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:30 seconds  Experience the turning of the tide on the intertidal zone in this 30 second timelapse filmed just outside the Sitka National Historical Park visitor center in April 2014!               Park Prescriptions Program   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 25 seconds  The Park Prescriptions Program promotes health and wellness within Sitka. To learn how you can become involved, watch our introductory Park RX video.
